entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: W 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
